content.rendered:
The Favourite Folding Poseur Table is made with a steel frame that can be folded down and opened up with ease.

The legs have protective caps to assist protecting your floor. 

Held in stock for immanent delivery. Made to the highest EU standards. Ideal for busy commercial venues where space is limited or where functions may require tables to be folded and stored away.

We also offer this item with a stretch cover to add a touch of class to your venue. Please note that the stretch covers are not CRIB5 certified unless stated.

excerpt.rendered: The Favourite Folding Poseur Table is made with a steel frame that can be folded down and opened up with ease….
